name: Harvest (itch) (kugit, longnut)
description:
Your Farm is on its Last Legs 

You need a great harvesting season to keep the farm up and running. Between your BILLS & the MORTGAGE you are swamped.

MAKE MONEY, BUY UPGRADES, and OVERCOME THE CHAOS that comes with running a farm.

PSA: There were going to be enemies that attacked the crops, but I ran out of time. Thank you for understanding & enjoy the game :D - kugit

Created By: Longnut (Nate Andrade) & kugit (Elijah Rossman)

Longnut - Sound Design + Menu Design

kugit - Programming + Game Design + Art

Credits for External Assets:
